xtc.lang.blink.agent

Interface AgentJavaDeclaration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaDebugger

    public interface AgentJavaDeclaration
    The Blink Agent's constant values visible to the Blink through the Java component debugger. The constant here should be consistent with the agent.h file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BDA_AGENT_NAME
      The agent name.
      static String BDA_AGENT_SOURCE_FILE
      Agent source file name.
      static String BDA_AGENT_VARIABLE_NAME
      The agent convenience variable manager name.
      static String BDA_CLEANTEMPVARS
      Cleaning the Java convenience variables.
      static String BDA_DUMMY_JAVA
      The native entry name to call dummy Java code.
      static String BDA_DUMMY_NATIVE
      The native entry name to call dummy native code.
      static String BDA_GETJAVATYPE
      Getting Java type name for a Java convenience variable.
      static String BDA_GETPROCESSID
      Getting the process id of the target JVM.
      static String BDA_getVJExpr
      Getting Java expression to read a Java convenience variable.
      static String BDA_GETVJJNITYPE
      Getting JNI type name for a Java convenience variable.
      static String BDA_INIT
      The initialization method.
      static String BDA_J2C
      Java to C transition method.
      static String BDA_JBP
      JBP method.
      static String BDA_SETVJFROMJAVAEXPR
      Creating a Java convenience variable.
